LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.1.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha comés un error fatal mentre intervenia a {PATIENT_labelShort} pels reptes especials de: {RECIPE_label}.
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.2.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha comés un error catastròfic mentre intervenia a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}).
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.3.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha comés un error ridícul mentre intervenia a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}).
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.4.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha comés un petit error mentre intervenia a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}).
